sourcesContent:
import { Component, type OnInit } from "@angular/core" import { CommonModule } from "@angular/common" import { Router } from "@angular/router" import { AuthService } from "../../services/auth.service" import { CampaignService } from '../../services/campaign.service'; @Component({ selector: "app-dashboard", standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `

Good Mail Dashboard

Welcome back!
{{ stats.emailsSent }}
Emails sent
{{ stats.clicks }}
Clicks in emails
{{ stats.revenue | currency }}
Email revenue
{{ (stats.growth * 100) | number:'1.0-2' }}%
Growth rate

Email Campaign Dashboard

Welcome to your email campaign management dashboard. This is where you'll manage your campaigns, track analytics, and grow your audience.

`, styleUrls: ["./dashboard.component.css"], }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { stats: any = null; constructor( private authService: AuthService, private campaignService: CampaignService, private router: Router, ) {} ngOnInit(): void { // Check if user is authenticated if (!this.authService.isAuthenticated()) { this.router.navigate(["/login"]) } else { this.campaignService.getDashboardStats().subscribe((res) => { this.stats = res?.data; }); } } logout(): void { this.authService.logout() this.router.navigate(["/login"]) } createCampaign() { this.router.navigate(["/campaigns/new"]); } }
